1: שִׁמְע֣וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hear</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַדָּבָ֗ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>ye the word</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> דִּבֶּ֧ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>speaketh</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>unto</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>unto you O house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
2: כֹּ֣ה ׀ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> דֶּ֤רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>not the way</n> הַגּוֹיִם֙ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the heathen</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּלְמָ֔דוּ <sup>3925 </sup> <n>Learn</n> וּמֵאֹת֥וֹת <sup>226 </sup> <n>at the signs</n> הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of heaven</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תֵּחָ֑תּוּ <sup>2865 </sup> <n>and be not dismayed</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Although</n> יֵחַ֥תּוּ <sup>2865 </sup> <n>are dismayed</n> הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>for the heathen</n> מֵהֵֽמָּה׃ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>at them</n>
3: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> חֻקּ֥וֹת <sup>2708 </sup> <n>For the customs</n> הָֽעַמִּ֖ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> הֶ֣בֶל <sup>1892 </sup> <n>[are] vain</n> ה֑וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> עֵץ֙ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>a tree</n> מִיַּ֣עַר <sup>3293 </sup> <n>out of the forest</n> כְּרָת֔וֹ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>for [one] cutteth</n> מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>the work</n> יְדֵ֥י־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of the hands</n> חָרָ֖שׁ <sup>2796 </sup> <n>of the workman</n> בַּֽמַּעֲצָֽד׃ <sup>4621 </sup> <n>with the axe</n>
4: בְּכֶ֥סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>it with silver</n> וּבְזָהָ֖ב <sup>2091 </sup> <n>and with gold</n> יְיַפֵּ֑הוּ <sup>3302 </sup> <n>They deck</n> בְּמַסְמְר֧וֹת <sup>4548 </sup> <n>it with nails</n> וּבְמַקָּב֛וֹת <sup>4717 </sup> <n>and with hammers</n> יְחַזְּק֖וּם <sup>2388 </sup> <n>they fasten</n> וְל֥וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָפִֽיק׃ <sup>6328 </sup> <n>that it move</n>
5: כְּתֹ֨מֶר <sup>8560 </sup> <n>as the palm tree</n> מִקְשָׁ֥ה <sup>4749 </sup> <n>They [are] upright</n> הֵ֙מָּה֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>and they</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>but speak</n> נָשׂ֥וֹא <sup>5375 </sup> <n>not they must needs</n> יִנָּשׂ֖וּא <sup>5375 </sup> <n>be borne</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> יִצְעָ֑דוּ <sup>6805 </sup> <n>because they cannot go</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּֽירְא֤וּ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>Be not afraid</n> מֵהֶם֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יָרֵ֔עוּ <sup>7489 </sup> <n>of them for they cannot do evil</n> וְגַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>any</n> הֵיטֵ֖יב <sup>3190 </sup> <n>neither also [is it] in them to do good</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>else</n> אוֹתָֽם׃ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> ס
